attributes.action: Put pressure on the British Olympic committee, to allow David Tennant as Doctor Who to light the Olympic flame for the 2012 Games in London
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Doctor Who is probably the longest running and best know British science fiction program.
It is show all around the world and has a huge following both here and abroad.
In a previous episode of the show he has already been seen lighting the flame and would be a great boost for  classic British television.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
